\bentry

\pron{Ejf}
\gl{\nA}
\bmng
\bnum
\num{1} vayasusx; pArxya; kaLeduhoVda badukina yA jiVvitada kAla yA avadhi: \eng{his age is twenty} avana vayasusx ipapxtutx. 
\num{2} vayasusx; yAvudeV udedxVshakekx agatayxvAda nidiRSaTx jiVvAvadhi: \eng{he was past the age for military service} seYnika seVvege yA seYnayxkekx seVruva vayasusx avanige AgihoVgitutx. 
\num{3} mupupx; vaqdAdhxpayx; vAdhaRkayx: \eng{the talkativeness of age} mupipxna mAtALitana, vAcALatana. 
\num{4} talemAru; talemore; piVLige: \eng{the age before the motor car} moVTAru gADiya hiMdaNa A talemAru; 
\num{5} (\BUvi) (BUmiya itihAsadalilx) yuga; aneVkAneVka vaSaRgaLa avadhi: \eng{the ice age} himayuga. 
\num{6} (\BUvi) yuga; kAla; shilAracaneya oMdu nidiRSaTx haMta yA sithxti rUpugoLuLxva avadhi. 
\num{7} (\AmA) (\kanmu\ \bava dalilx) yuga; diVGaRkAla; bahaLa hotutx; bahukAla: \eng{waiting for ages} bahaLa hotitxniMda kAyutatx. \eng{it seemed an age} oMdu yugaveV kaLedaMte toVritu. 
\num{8} (\ca) yuga; itihAsada yAvudeV gotAtxda kAla, avadhi: \eng{Stone Age} shilAyuga. \eng{the age of atomic science} paramANu vijAcnxnada yuga. 
\num{9} AyuSayx; Ayasusx; vayoVmAna; jiVvitakAla; jiVvamAna; AyudARya: \eng{the normal age of a dog is reckoned as twelve years} nAyiya AyuSayx sAmAnayxvAgi hanenxraDu vaSaRveMdu parigaNisalAgide. 
\num{10} vayasusx; jiVvanada yAvudeV avasethx yA avadhi: \eng{a person of middle age} madhayxvayasisxna vayxkitx. 
\num{11} pArxya; vayasusx; pArxpatxvayasusx; \kanmu\ vayxkitxyu kAnUnuriVtAyx hakukxgaLu hAgU javAbAdxrigaLanunx paDeyuva kAla: \eng{he reached the age of marriage} avanige maduveya pArxya baMtu. 
\num{12} samakAla; tatAkxla; samakAliVna avadhi: \eng{poet of his age} avana kAlada kavi. 
\num{13} vayasusx; deYhika, Anasika yA BAvuka beLavaNigeya maTaTx: \eng{though he is only seven, his mental age is ten} avanige ELeV vaSaRvAgideyAdarU avana mAnasika vayasusx hatutx.
\enum
\emng

\noindent
\gl{\pagu}
\bmng
\bnum
\num{1} \eng{full age} (iMgelxMDina \nAyxshA) pArxpatxvayasusx; \eng{21} vaSaRgaLu. 
\num{2} \eng{look one's age} vayasisxge takakxMte kANu; vayasisxge takakx AkAra, gAtarx iru; eSuTx vayasAsxgideyoV aSuTx kANu. 
\num{3} \eng{moon's age} shukalx (pakaSxda) tithi; amAvAseyxya naMtara kaLeda dinagaLu. 
\numi{4} \eng{over age} 
\banum
\alnum{a} sAkaSuTx vayasAsxda; kAla saMda; haLeyadAda: \eng{over age warships} haLeya yudadhxnwkegaLu. 

\alnum{b} vayasusx miVrida; nidiRSaTx vayoVmitiyanunx dATida; pArxya kaLeda: \eng{over age students} pArxyamiVrida vidAyxthiRgaLu; vayasAsxda vidAyxthiRgaLu. 
\eanum
\numie
\hyperdef{A}{age(1) pagu(5)}{}
\num{5} \eng{under age} sAkaSuTx vayasAsxgirada; vayasisxge barada; (\kanmu\ kAnUnuriVtAyx) pArxpatxvayasakxnAgirada.
\enum
\emng

\noindent
\gl{\nuga}
\bmng
\bnum
\num{1} \eng{act one's age} = \hyperlink{age(1) nuga(4)}{?nuga?\((4)\)}. 
\hypertarget{age(1) nuga(2)}{}
\num{2} \eng{age before beauty} vayasisxge Adayxte koDabeVku, pArxdhAnayx niVDabeVku, parxthama sAthxnaviVyabeVku; doDaDxvarAda meVle cikakxvaru barabeVku. 
\num{3} \eng{age before honesty} = \hyperlink{age(1) nuga(2)}{?nuga?\((2)\)}.
\hypertarget{age(1) nuga(4)}{}
\num{4} \eng{be your age} (\AmA) yoVgayxvAgi vatiRsu; gaMBiVravAgi, javAbAdxriyiMda vatiRsu; vayasisxge takakxMte--naDeduko, iru; vayoVcitavAgi naDeduko.
